item.title: How to Format an USB Drive From Terminal
item.description: Formatting an USB-stick is a pretty easy task to do, it can be done in multiple ways, like using File managers, GUI disk utility applications like Disks, GParted etc. It can also be done fairly easily from terminal and this blog will show you how to.
